title: 'The most powerful person in Canada shouldn’t give a sh—': Canada has mixed reaction to Trudeau defending wife from angry heckler
content:
1. 'The most powerful person in Canada shouldn’t give a sh—': Canada has mixed reaction to Trudeau defending wife from angry heckler  Yahoo News
  2. Trudeau tells off protesters: "Isn't there a hospital you should be going to bother right now?"  Global News
  3. Liberals ahead in election polls, favoured in seats  CBC News
  4. Opinion | Don't blame Canada's vitriolic election on U.S. politics. It's as Canadian as it gets.  The Washington Post
  5. Canada is a pedestrian nation  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
